name: Orbit Shift
description:
Use your connected planets that orbit to dodge incoming asteroids and get a high score on multiple different levels! Part of the 3-day Make-a-game game jam, where the theme is connected.

-How to play-

Press [Space] to switch planet orbits.  W and 🡡 extend the orbit, while S and 🡣 tighten the orbit.  Use the orbiting to move around the screen.  Avoid the asteroids and move in circles to gain points. You also get points by staying alive. Have fun!
